MAN.TITLE: pvm_get_timer
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Gets the system's notion of the current time.

DESCRIPTION.P: pvm_get_timer returns the time elapsed since the last call of pvm_get_timer or the last call of pvm_set_timer. The time is expressed in elapsed microseconds. The resolution of the system clock is hardware dependent; the time may be updated continuously or in clock ticks.
will be > 0. If some error occurs then
